verses.text: Thus saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* to his anointed , to Cyrus , whose right hand I have holden , to subdue nations before him; and I will loose the loins of kings , to open before him the two leaved gates ; and the gates shall not be shut ;\f + \fr 45.1 \ft have…: or, strengthened\f*
I will go before thee, and make the crooked places straight : I will break in pieces the gates of brass , and cut in sunder the bars of iron :

And I will give thee the treasures of darkness , and hidden riches of secret places , that thou mayest know that I, the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, which call \add thee\add* by thy name , \add am\add* the God of Israel.
For Jacob my servant’s sake, and Israel mine elect , I have even called thee by thy name : I have surnamed thee, though thou hast not known me. \p
¶ I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and \add there is\add* none else, \add there is\add* no God beside me: I girded thee, though thou hast not known me:
That they may know from the rising of the sun , and from the west , that \add there is\add* none beside me. I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and \add there is\add* none else.
I form the light , and create darkness : I make peace , and create evil : I the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* do all these \add things\add*.

Drop down , ye heavens , from above , and let the skies pour down righteousness : let the earth open , and let them bring forth salvation , and let righteousness spring up together ; I the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* have created it.

Woe unto him that striveth with his Maker ! \add Let\add* the potsherd \add strive\add* with the potsherds of the earth. Shall the clay say to him that fashioneth it, What makest thou? or thy work , He hath no hands ?
Woe unto him that saith unto \add his\add* father , What begettest thou? or to the woman , What hast thou brought forth ? \p
Thus saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, the Holy One of Israel , and his Maker , Ask me of things to come concerning my sons , and concerning the work of my hands command ye me.
I have made the earth , and created man upon it: I, \add even\add* my hands , have stretched out the heavens , and all their host have I commanded.

I have raised him up in righteousness , and I will direct all his ways : he shall build my city , and he shall let go my captives , not for price nor reward , saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of hosts.\f + \fr 45.13 \ft direct: or, make straight\f*

Thus saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, The labour of Egypt , and merchandise of Ethiopia and of the Sabeans , men of stature , shall come over unto thee, and they shall be thine: they shall come after thee; in chains they shall come over , and they shall fall down unto thee, they shall make supplication unto thee, \add saying\add*, Surely God \add is\add* in thee; and \add there is\add* none else, \add there is\add* no God.
Verily thou \add art\add* a God that hidest thyself, O God of Israel , the Saviour.
They shall be ashamed , and also confounded , all of them: they shall go to confusion together \add that are\add* makers of idols.
\add But\add* Israel shall be saved in the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* with an everlasting salvation : ye shall not be ashamed nor confounded world without end.

For thus saith the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* that created the heavens ; God himself that formed the earth and made it; he hath established it, he created it not in vain , he formed it to be inhabited : I \add am\add* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*; and \add there is\add* none else.

I have not spoken in secret , in a dark place of the earth : I said not unto the seed of Jacob , Seek ye me in vain : I the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* speak righteousness , I declare things that are right. \p

¶ Assemble yourselves and come ; draw near together , ye \add that are\add* escaped of the nations : they have no knowledge that set up the wood of their graven image , and pray unto a god \add that\add* cannot save.

Tell ye, and bring \add them\add* near ; yea, let them take counsel together : who hath declared this from ancient time ? \add who\add* hath told it from that time? \add have\add* not I the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*? and \add there is\add* no God else beside me; a just God and a Saviour ; \add there is\add* none beside me.
Look unto me, and be ye saved , all the ends of the earth : for I \add am\add* God , and \add there is\add* none else.
I have sworn by myself, the word is gone out of my mouth \add in\add* righteousness , and shall not return , That unto me every knee shall bow , every tongue shall swear.

Surely, shall \add one\add* say , in the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* have I righteousness and strength : \add even\add* to him shall \add men\add* come ; and all that are incensed against him shall be ashamed.\f + \fr 45.24 \ft Surely…: or, Surely he shall say of me, In the \+nd LORD\+nd* is all righteousness and strength\f*\f + \fr 45.24 \ft righteousness: Heb. righteousnesses\f*
In the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall all the seed of Israel be justified , and shall glory.
